TextBlock.Text: DEUTZIA: This is <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>. It will be your Vessel.

DEUTZIA: It is an old type of Vessel from before advanced technologies such as warping had been discovered. I, however, had upgraded it with modern Nomai technology including a warp core and a gravity cannon.
DEUTZIA: I have also left notes for you regarding the operation of <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>. Make sure to read them carefully.
DEUTZIA: Once you have done so, this will officialy be your Vessel to explore the universe with.
PROTEA: Thank you so much! I'm going to have a hard time waiting!
